name: Atomic_Overhaul
title: Atomic Overhaul
description:
Atomic Overhaul is a mod for Factorio adding new nuclear fuels, recipes and technologies to the game.
 Developed by X_Man1109 and fainda.

You can help to translate this mod on crowdin! 
https://crowdin.com/project/factorio-mods-localization --> Atomic Overhaul
author: X_Man1109, fainda
